creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: pounded indigo; top rust band and red ties are floral embroidered in blue and green; center square divided into four red squares with floral embroidery in blue, green, pink surrounded by applique strips; plain red, blue and white braid borders; black lining with lower edge hemmed separately
title: Baby Carrier
